content.en: Deformable image registration: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms, such as fully convolutional neural networks, adversarial deep networks, and deep learning methods, to improve the accuracy and speed of deformable registration in medical imaging. These algorithms aim to enhance the performance of image registration, which involves aligning different medical images for analysis and diagnosis. By optimizing the network architectures and objective functions, scientists are working towards automating the learning process and achieving more precise and efficient deformable medical image registration.
content.da: Deformerbar billedregistrering: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom fuldt konvolutionelle neurale netværk, dybe modstander-netværk og dyb læringsmetoder, for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og hastigheden af deformerbar registrering i medicinsk billeddannelse. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre ydeevnen af billedregistrering, som indebærer justering af forskellige medicinske billeder til analyse og diagnose. Ved at optimere netværksarkitekturerne og de objektive funktioner arbejder videnskabsfolk på at automatisere læreprocessen og opnå mere præcis og effektiv deformerbar medicinsk billedregistrering.
